member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.AircraftData
member.summary: The make, model, and type of an aircraft.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.AircraftData.Code
member.summary: The aircraft code. For example, for a Boeing 777 the code would be 777.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.AircraftData.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as an aircraftData object. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#aircraftData

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.AircraftData.Name
member.summary: The name of an aircraft, for example Boeing 777.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.AircraftData.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.AirportData
member.summary: An airport.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.AirportData.City
member.summary: The city code an airport is located in. For example, for JFK airport, this is NYC.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.AirportData.Code
member.summary: An airport's code. For example, for Boston Logan airport, this is BOS.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.AirportData.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as an airport object. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#airportData.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.AirportData.Name
member.summary: The name of an airport. For example, for airport BOS the name is "Boston Logan International".

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.AirportData.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.BagDescriptor
member.summary: Information about an item of baggage.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.BagDescriptor.CommercialName
member.summary: Provides the commercial name for an optional service.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.BagDescriptor.Count
member.summary: How many of this type of bag will be checked on this flight.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.BagDescriptor.Description
member.summary: A description of the baggage.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.BagDescriptor.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as a baggage object. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#bagDescriptor.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.BagDescriptor.Subcode
member.summary: The standard IATA subcode used to identify this optional service.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.BagDescriptor.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.CarrierData
member.summary: Information about a carrier (ie. an airline, bus line, railroad, etc) that might be useful to display to an end-user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.CarrierData.Code
member.summary: The IATA designator of a carrier (airline, etc). For example, for American Airlines, the code is AA.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.CarrierData.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as a kind of carrier (ie. an airline, bus line, railroad, etc). Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#carrierData.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.CarrierData.Name
member.summary: The long, full name of a carrier. For example: American Airlines.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.CarrierData.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.CityData
member.summary: Information about a city that might be useful to an end-user; typically the city of an airport.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.CityData.Code
member.summary: The IATA character ID of a city. For example, for Boston this is BOS.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.CityData.Country
member.summary: The two-character country code of the country the city is located in. For example, US for the United States of America.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.CityData.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as a city, typically with one or more airports. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#cityData.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.CityData.Name
member.summary: The full name of a city. An example would be: New York.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.CityData.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.Data
member.summary: Detailed information about components found in the solutions of this response, including a trip's airport, city, taxes, airline, and aircraft.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.Data.Aircraft
member.summary: The aircraft that is flying between an origin and destination.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.Data.Airport
member.summary: The airport of an origin or destination.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.Data.Carrier
member.summary: The airline carrier of the aircraft flying between an origin and destination. Allowed values are IATA carrier codes.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.Data.City
member.summary: The city that is either the origin or destination of part of a trip.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.Data.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as QPX Express response resource, including a trip's airport, city, taxes, airline, and aircraft. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#data.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.Data.Tax
member.summary: The taxes due for flying between an origin and a destination.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.Data.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FareInfo
member.summary: Complete information about a fare used in the solution to a low-fare search query. In the airline industry a fare is a price an airline charges for one-way travel between two points. A fare typically contains a carrier code, two city codes, a price, and a fare basis. (A fare basis is a one-to-eight character alphanumeric code used to identify a fare.)

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FareInfo.Carrier
member.summary: The carrier of the aircraft or other vehicle commuting between two points.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FareInfo.Destination
member.summary: The city code of the city the trip ends at.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FareInfo.Id
member.summary: A unique identifier of the fare.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FareInfo.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as a fare object. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#fareInfo.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FareInfo.Origin
member.summary: The city code of the city the trip begins at.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FareInfo.Private__
member.summary: Whether this is a private fare, for example one offered only to select customers rather than the general public.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FareInfo.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FlightInfo
member.summary: A flight is a sequence of legs with the same airline carrier and flight number. (A leg is the smallest unit of travel, in the case of a flight a takeoff immediately followed by a landing at two set points on a particular carrier with a particular flight number.) The naive view is that a flight is scheduled travel of an aircraft between two points, with possibly intermediate stops, but carriers will frequently list flights that require a change of aircraft between legs.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FlightInfo.Number
member.summary: The flight number.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FlightInfo.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FreeBaggageAllowance
member.summary: Information about free baggage allowed on one segment of a trip.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FreeBaggageAllowance.BagDescriptor
member.summary: A representation of a type of bag, such as an ATPCo subcode, Commercial Name, or other description.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FreeBaggageAllowance.Kilos
member.summary: The maximum number of kilos all the free baggage together may weigh.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FreeBaggageAllowance.KilosPerPiece
member.summary: The maximum number of kilos any one piece of baggage may weigh.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FreeBaggageAllowance.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as free baggage object, allowed on one segment of a trip. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#freeBaggageAllowance.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FreeBaggageAllowance.Pieces
member.summary: The number of free pieces of baggage allowed.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FreeBaggageAllowance.Pounds
member.summary: The number of pounds of free baggage allowed.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.FreeBaggageAllowance.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo
member.summary: Information about a leg. (A leg is the smallest unit of travel, in the case of a flight a takeoff immediately followed by a landing at two set points on a particular carrier with a particular flight number.)

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.Aircraft
member.summary: The aircraft (or bus, ferry, railcar, etc) travelling between the two points of this leg.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.ArrivalTime
member.summary: The scheduled time of arrival at the destination of the leg, local to the point of arrival.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.ChangePlane
member.summary: Whether you have to change planes following this leg. Only applies to the next leg.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.ConnectionDuration
member.summary: Duration of a connection following this leg, in minutes.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.DepartureTime
member.summary: The scheduled departure time of the leg, local to the point of departure.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.Destination
member.summary: The leg destination as a city and airport.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.DestinationTerminal
member.summary: The terminal the flight is scheduled to arrive at.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.Duration
member.summary: The scheduled travelling time from the origin to the destination.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.Id
member.summary: An identifier that uniquely identifies this leg in the solution.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as a leg object. A leg is the smallest unit of travel, in the case of a flight a takeoff immediately followed by a landing at two set points on a particular carrier with a particular flight number. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#legInfo.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.Meal
member.summary: A simple, general description of the meal(s) served on the flight, for example: "Hot meal".

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.Mileage
member.summary: The number of miles in this leg.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.OnTimePerformance
member.summary: In percent, the published on time performance on this leg.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.OperatingDisclosure
member.summary: Department of Transportation disclosure information on the actual operator of a flight in a code share. (A code share refers to a marketing agreement between two carriers, where one carrier will list in its schedules (and take bookings for) flights that are actually operated by another carrier.)

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.Origin
member.summary: The leg origin as a city and airport.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.OriginTerminal
member.summary: The terminal the flight is scheduled to depart from.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.Secure
member.summary: Whether passenger information must be furnished to the United States Transportation Security Administration (TSA) prior to departure.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.LegInfo.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PassengerCounts
member.summary: The number and type of passengers. Unfortunately the definition of an infant, child, adult, and senior citizen varies across carriers and reservation systems.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PassengerCounts.AdultCount
member.summary: The number of passengers that are adults.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PassengerCounts.ChildCount
member.summary: The number of passengers that are children.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PassengerCounts.InfantInLapCount
member.summary: The number of passengers that are infants travelling in the lap of an adult.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PassengerCounts.InfantInSeatCount
member.summary: The number of passengers that are infants each assigned a seat.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PassengerCounts.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as a passenger count object, representing the number of passengers. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#passengerCounts.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PassengerCounts.SeniorCount
member.summary: The number of passengers that are senior citizens.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PassengerCounts.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PricingInfo
member.summary: The price of one or more travel segments. The currency used to purchase tickets is usually determined by the sale/ticketing city or the sale/ticketing country, unless none are specified, in which case it defaults to that of the journey origin country.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PricingInfo.BaseFareTotal
member.summary: The total fare in the base fare currency (the currency of the country of origin). This element is only present when the sales currency and the currency of the country of commencement are different.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PricingInfo.Fare
member.summary: The fare used to price one or more segments.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PricingInfo.FareCalculation
member.summary: The horizontal fare calculation. This is a field on a ticket that displays all of the relevant items that go into the calculation of the fare.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PricingInfo.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as a pricing object, representing the price of one or more travel segments. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#pricingInfo.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PricingInfo.LatestTicketingTime
member.summary: The latest ticketing time for this pricing assuming the reservation occurs at ticketing time and there is no change in fares/rules. The time is local to the point of sale (POS).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PricingInfo.Passengers
member.summary: The number of passengers to which this price applies.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PricingInfo.Ptc
member.summary: The passenger type code for this pricing. An alphanumeric code used by a carrier to restrict fares to certain categories of passenger. For instance, a fare might be valid only for senior citizens.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PricingInfo.Refundable
member.summary: Whether the fares on this pricing are refundable.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PricingInfo.SaleFareTotal
member.summary: The total fare in the sale or equivalent currency.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PricingInfo.SaleTaxTotal
member.summary: The taxes in the sale or equivalent currency.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PricingInfo.SaleTotal
member.summary: Total per-passenger price (fare and tax) in the sale or equivalent currency.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PricingInfo.SegmentPricing
member.summary: The per-segment price and baggage information.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PricingInfo.Tax
member.summary: The taxes used to calculate the tax total per ticket.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.PricingInfo.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentInfo
member.summary: Details of a segment of a flight; a segment is one or more consecutive legs on the same flight. For example a hypothetical flight ZZ001, from DFW to OGG, would have one segment with two legs: DFW to HNL (leg 1), HNL to OGG (leg 2), and DFW to OGG (legs 1 and 2).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentInfo.BookingCode
member.summary: The booking code or class for this segment.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentInfo.BookingCodeCount
member.summary: The number of seats available in this booking code on this segment.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentInfo.Cabin
member.summary: The cabin booked for this segment.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentInfo.ConnectionDuration
member.summary: In minutes, the duration of the connection following this segment.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentInfo.Duration
member.summary: The duration of the flight segment in minutes.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentInfo.Flight
member.summary: The flight this is a segment of.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentInfo.Id
member.summary: An id uniquely identifying the segment in the solution.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentInfo.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as a segment object. A segment is one or more consecutive legs on the same flight. For example a hypothetical flight ZZ001, from DFW to OGG, could have one segment with two legs: DFW to HNL (leg 1), HNL to OGG (leg 2). Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#segmentInfo.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentInfo.Leg
member.summary: The legs composing this segment.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentInfo.MarriedSegmentGroup
member.summary: The solution-based index of a segment in a married segment group. Married segments can only be booked together. For example, an airline might report a certain booking code as sold out from Boston to Pittsburgh, but as available as part of two married segments Boston to Chicago connecting through Pittsburgh. For example content of this field, consider the round-trip flight ZZ1 PHX-PHL ZZ2 PHL-CLT ZZ3 CLT-PHX. This has three segments, with the two outbound ones (ZZ1 ZZ2) married. In this case, the two outbound segments belong to married segment group 0, and the return segment belongs to married segment group 1.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentInfo.SubjectToGovernmentApproval
member.summary: Whether the operation of this segment remains subject to government approval.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentInfo.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentPricing
member.summary: The price of this segment.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentPricing.FareId
member.summary: A segment identifier unique within a single solution. It is used to refer to different parts of the same solution.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentPricing.FreeBaggageOption
member.summary: Details of the free baggage allowance on this segment.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentPricing.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as a segment pricing object, representing the price of this segment. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#segmentPricing.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentPricing.SegmentId
member.summary: Unique identifier in the response of this segment.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SegmentPricing.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInfo
member.summary: Information about a slice. A slice represents a traveller's intent, the portion of a low-fare search corresponding to a traveler's request to get between two points. One-way journeys are generally expressed using 1 slice, round-trips using 2. For example, if a traveler specifies the following trip in a user interface: | Origin | Destination | Departure Date | | BOS | LAX | March 10, 2007 | | LAX | SYD | March 17, 2007 | | SYD | BOS | March 22, 2007 | then this is a three slice trip.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInfo.Duration
member.summary: The duration of the slice in minutes.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInfo.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as a slice object. A slice represents a traveller's intent, the portion of a low- fare search corresponding to a traveler's request to get between two points. One-way journeys are generally expressed using 1 slice, round-trips using 2. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#sliceInfo.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInfo.Segment
member.summary: The segment(s) constituting the slice.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInfo.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInput
member.summary: Criteria a desired slice must satisfy.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInput.Alliance
member.summary: Slices with only the carriers in this alliance should be returned; do not use this field with permittedCarrier. Allowed values are ONEWORLD, SKYTEAM, and STAR.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInput.Date
member.summary: Departure date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInput.Destination
member.summary: Airport or city IATA designator of the destination.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInput.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as a slice input object, representing the criteria a desired slice must satisfy. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#sliceInput.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInput.MaxConnectionDuration
member.summary: The longest connection between two legs, in minutes, you are willing to accept.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInput.MaxStops
member.summary: The maximum number of stops you are willing to accept in this slice.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInput.Origin
member.summary: Airport or city IATA designator of the origin.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInput.PermittedCarrier
member.summary: A list of 2-letter IATA airline designators. Slices with only these carriers should be returned.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInput.PermittedDepartureTime
member.summary: Slices must depart in this time of day range, local to the point of departure.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInput.PreferredCabin
member.summary: Prefer solutions that book in this cabin for this slice. Allowed values are COACH, PREMIUM_COACH, BUSINESS, and FIRST.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInput.ProhibitedCarrier
member.summary: A list of 2-letter IATA airline designators. Exclude slices that use these carriers.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.SliceInput.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TaxData
member.summary: Tax data.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TaxData.Id
member.summary: An identifier uniquely identifying a tax in a response.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TaxData.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as a tax data object, representing some tax. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#taxData.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TaxData.Name
member.summary: The name of a tax.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TaxData.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TaxInfo
member.summary: Tax information.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TaxInfo.ChargeType
member.summary: Whether this is a government charge or a carrier surcharge.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TaxInfo.Code
member.summary: The code to enter in the ticket's tax box.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TaxInfo.Country
member.summary: For government charges, the country levying the charge.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TaxInfo.Id
member.summary: Identifier uniquely identifying this tax in a response. Not present for unnamed carrier surcharges.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TaxInfo.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as a tax information object. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#taxInfo.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TaxInfo.SalePrice
member.summary: The price of the tax in the sales or equivalent currency.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TaxInfo.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TimeOfDayRange
member.summary: Two times in a single day defining a time range.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TimeOfDayRange.EarliestTime
member.summary: The earliest time of day in HH:MM format.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TimeOfDayRange.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as a time of day range object, representing two times in a single day defining a time range. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#timeOfDayRange.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TimeOfDayRange.LatestTime
member.summary: The latest time of day in HH:MM format.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TimeOfDayRange.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOption
member.summary: Trip information.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOption.Id
member.summary: Identifier uniquely identifying this trip in a response.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOption.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as a trip information object. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#tripOption.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOption.Pricing
member.summary: Per passenger pricing information.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOption.SaleTotal
member.summary: The total price for all passengers on the trip, in the form of a currency followed by an amount, e.g. USD253.35.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOption.Slice
member.summary: The slices that make up this trip's itinerary.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOption.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOptionsRequest
member.summary: A QPX Express search request, which will yield one or more solutions.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOptionsRequest.MaxPrice
member.summary: Do not return solutions that cost more than this price. The alphabetical part of the price is in ISO 4217. The format, in regex, is [A-Z]{3}\d+(\.\d+)? Example: $102.07

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOptionsRequest.Passengers
member.summary: Counts for each passenger type in the request.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOptionsRequest.Refundable
member.summary: Return only solutions with refundable fares.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOptionsRequest.SaleCountry
member.summary: IATA country code representing the point of sale. This determines the "equivalent amount paid" currency for the ticket.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOptionsRequest.Slice
member.summary: The slices that make up the itinerary of this trip. A slice represents a traveler's intent, the portion of a low-fare search corresponding to a traveler's request to get between two points. One-way journeys are generally expressed using one slice, round-trips using two. An example of a one slice trip with three segments might be BOS-SYD, SYD-LAX, LAX-BOS if the traveler only stopped in SYD and LAX just long enough to change planes.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOptionsRequest.Solutions
member.summary: The number of solutions to return, maximum 500.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOptionsRequest.TicketingCountry
member.summary: IATA country code representing the point of ticketing.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOptionsRequest.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOptionsResponse
member.summary: A QPX Express search response.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOptionsResponse.Data
member.summary: Informational data global to list of solutions.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOptionsResponse.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as a QPX Express trip response object, which consists of zero or more solutions. Value: the fixed string qpxexpress#tripOptions.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOptionsResponse.RequestId
member.summary: An identifier uniquely identifying this response.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOptionsResponse.TripOption
member.summary: A list of priced itinerary solutions to the QPX Express query.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripOptionsResponse.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripsSearchRequest
member.summary: A QPX Express search request.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripsSearchRequest.Request
member.summary: A QPX Express search request. Required values are at least one adult or senior passenger, an origin, a destination, and a date.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripsSearchRequest.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripsSearchResponse
member.summary: A QPX Express search response.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripsSearchResponse.Kind
member.summary: Identifies this as a QPX Express API search response resource. Value: the fixed string qpxExpress#tripsSearch.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripsSearchResponse.Trips
member.summary: All possible solutions to the QPX Express search request.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.QPXExpress.v1.Data.TripsSearchResponse.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.
